history.response:
Based on the provided document, Twin Engineers Private Limited is seeking a passionate Sales Associate to join their team. The job description outlines the key responsibilities of the role, which include:

Prospecting in assigned sales territory / Cold Calls
Technical study of client requirement / RFQ (Request for Quote)
Preparation of Technical & Commercial offer
Client Follow-up, Negotiation & Deal closing persuasively

The Sales Associate will also be responsible for existing customer courtesy visits, attending internal and external client meetings, preparing sales reports, and coordinating with various departments such as CFT, design, and production.

To be eligible for this role, the candidate should have a 2025 pass-out batch and possess strong verbal and written communication skills. Prior experience in sales is preferred, but not mandatory. The salary range for this position is INR. 4.00 LPA to INR. 5.00 LPA.

The Data Protection & Employee Privacy document outlines the company's policies on data protection, confidentiality, employee privacy, and security measures related to remote access and data breaches.

The company follows a structured response plan in case of a data breach, which includes immediate notification of affected employees/customers, application of security patches, and regular audits to prevent future incidents. The company also enforces strict confidentiality protocols, including secure data handling, encryption, and password protection for confidential documents. Role-based access control ensures data security, and employees are restricted from sharing confidential data without approval.
